item.title: Contact
item.description: Follow me on these social media platforms. Platform URL Website: https://vishal-aiml164.github.io/vishal_aiml_portfolio/ Medium: https://vishal-aiml164.medium.com/ GitHub: https://github.com/vishal-aiml164/ML_PROJECTS

item.title: Project-1: Diabetes Patient Re-Admission Prediction
item.description: Healthcare providers have benfited greatly from technological advancements. These days they have an extra challenge of finding the patients whom they need to treat multiple times, especially diabetic patients. The Goal behind this task, is to use this information for optimal resource allocation and better functioning. Link to Medium Article Link to Github Repository

item.title: Project-2: Predicting the number of likes for youtube video
item.description: YouTuber is developed as a new type of career in recent decades. It also has become a source to earn money based on the popularity of the videos. The Goal here is to have a preliminary prediction of the videos likes, and understanding on their videosâ€™ performance, so that they may adjust their video to gain the more attention from the public, and eventually earn more money. Link to Medium Article

item.title: Project-3: Multi-Class Classification of Research Articles
item.description: Researchers have access to large online archives of scientific articles. As a consequence, finding relevant articles has become more and more difficult. Tagging or topic modelling provides a way to give clear token of identification to research articles which facilitates recommendation and search process in a much better way. Goal here is to predict the tags for each article based on the abstract words(NLP). Link to Medium Article Link to Github Repository
